dcterms:creator: T. Kanade
J. F. Cohn
Yingli Tian
dcterms:description: A comprehensive database for facial expression analysis containing 326 gray-scale videos of 64×64 pixels of 118 characters performing six actions: anger, disgust, fear, happy, sad, and surprise.
dcterms:title: Cohn-Kanade (CK+) facial dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset generated by the authors containing 10,000 RGB videos of 64×64 pixels creating 24 motion classes performed by characters, which correspond to six actions times four perspectives.
dcterms:title: Liberated Pixel Cup (LPC) sprites

dcterms:creator: Nitish Srivastava
Elman Mansimov
Ruslan Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 10,000 binary videos of 64×64 pixels with ten identities corresponding to the digits from 0 to 9, where all videos have 32 frames and the digits follow linear trajectories.
dcterms:title: Moving MNIST (MMNIST)

dcterms:description: A dataset generated by the authors containing 10,000 videos of 64×64 pixels from images provided by Deepmind, where moving sprites have all possible sizes and shape types.
dcterms:title: Deepmind’s dSprites

dcterms:description: A dataset generated by the authors containing 10,000 videos of 64×64 pixels from images provided by Deepmind, where various shapes yield different identities and motion classes.
dcterms:title: Deepmind’s 3dShapes

dcterms:creator: N. Aifanti
C. Papachristou
A. Delopoulos
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 931 RGB videos of 64×64 pixels of 52 characters performing six actions: anger, disgust, fear, happy, sad, and surprise.
dcterms:title: Multimedia Understanding Group (MUG) facial dataset
